definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.chinese: 燕麦，亚麻籽，蓝莓和杏仁。

sentences.english: The Shipper and the Chief Officer are discussing the torn bags of castor seeds at the Dispatch Office.
sentences.chinese: 发货人跟大副正在调度室谈论蓖麻籽袋子破损的事。

sentences.english: The stone wheel crushes it to a pulp , which is then pressed to extract the oil .
sentences.chinese: 砂轮将亚麻籽碾成浆状，然后送去挤压，榨出油来。

sentences.english: Dry fry the cumin and coriander seeds, then grind them into a powder using a pestle and mortar.
sentences.chinese: 干炒孜然和芫荽籽，然后用杵和臼磨成碎末。

sentences.english: Other functional ingredients in granatum such as flavone, q.
sentences.chinese: 黄酮和生物碱等功能成分含量也均高于石榴籽。

sentences.english: When their linseed is ripe for harvest the hemp is in bloom in our field.
sentences.chinese: 他们的亚麻籽成熟收获时，我们田间的大麻正在开花。

sentences.english: Peel the mandarin, remove pith and any seeds from each segment.
sentences.chinese: 柑橘剥皮，去除每一瓣的皮及籽。

sentences.english: Will Nitiric acid destroy a ready mixed oil varnish with the turpentine and linseed oil already mixed in?
sentences.chinese: 硝酸是否能损坏已经混合了松脂和亚麻籽的清漆？

sentences.english: How to open and seed a Pomegranate?
sentences.chinese: 如何容易的取下红石榴的籽？

sentences.english: Through boll weight, the indirect effect of seed index fo lint in F3 generation was quite obvious.
sentences.chinese: 籽指通过铃重对F_3代衣分的间接作用亦十分明显。

sentences.english: Many nutrition health protection functional compositions are involved in the flaxseed.
sentences.chinese: 胡麻籽中含有诸多的营养保健功能成分。

sentences.english: We had gathered magnolia seed pods for hand grenades;
sentences.chinese: 我们把木兰花籽的荚果集拢起来，当手榴弹用。

sentences.english: This paper studies the method of extraction of ricinine in castor pomace.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了蓖麻渣和蓖麻籽中蓖麻碱的提取方法。

sentences.english: Excessive fly and seed bits embedded on flat wire.
sentences.chinese: 盖板针布中嵌入了过多的飞花和籽屑。

sentences.english: Add the tomatoes and fennel seeds and cook for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 添加准备好的番茄和茴香籽再煮一分钟。

sentences.english: No parabens, harsh preservatives or grapefruit seed extract.
sentences.chinese: 没有苯甲酸酯，苛刻的防腐剂或葡萄柚籽提取物。

definition: to peel/to remove the skin/to tare
papaya (Carica papaya)/genus Chaenomeles of shrubs in the family Rosaceae/Chinese flowering quince (Chaenomeles speciosa)
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
